hero.title: Create AI Quiz for Free
hero.subtitle: QuizKen helps teachers and students create multiple-choice quizzes with AI in seconds
hero.typingText: Create any quiz with AI. Perfect for everyone

features.title: Why Choose QuizKen
features.subtitle: The smartest way to create engaging quizzes. Use advanced AI to deliver quality educational content instantly.

items.title: AI-Powered Quizzes
items.description: Advanced AI creates smart, contextually relevant questions tailored to your exact topic.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Generate complete quiz sets in seconds instead of hours. Save time and boost productivity.

items.title: Diverse Topics
items.description: Create quizzes for any subject: science, history, languages, or custom topics.

items.title: Customizable Difficulty
items.description: Adjust difficulty levels from basic to advanced to match your target audience.

items.title: Perfect for Everyone
items.description: Ideal for teachers, students, content creators, and anyone who needs quizzes.

items.title: Quality Questions
items.description: Every question includes detailed explanations to enhance learning and retention
